p.s: The author Brian Pollard changes his opinion on worker unions over the years.
And explains why he doesn't support unions anymore.
He says that unions have turned useless and only care about power and greed.
Brian Pollard thinks that unions nowadays only block companies from becoming successfullsuccessful in their sector.
Because union workers don't have the pressure to work in their best form to keep their jobs, and still produce high priced products.
The companies won't become famous or reach ana high number of costumers.
